en_title: Government statement on judgment of oath-taking case
zh_title: 政府就宣誓案件判決的聲明

en: In response to media enquiries on the judgment handed down on the government's legal proceedings concerning the oath-taking of Sixtus Leung Chung-hang and Yau Wai-ching, a government spokesman gave the following response today (November 15):

"We note the Court's judgment on the construction of the relevant provisions in the Oaths and Declarations Ordinance (Cap 11) and the Legislative Council Ordinance (Cap 542) in light of Article 104 of the Basic Law. We will consider the Interpretation of Article 104 of the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, the judgment and the way forward."
zh: 就傳媒查詢法庭頒下政府提出對梁頌恆及游蕙禎的宣誓訴訟案件判決，政府發言人今日（十一月十五日）回應如下︰
「我們得悉法庭的判決，就香港《基本法》第一百零四條對《宣誓及聲明條例》（第11章）及《立法會條例》（第542章）內有關條文的闡釋。我們會研究《全國人民代表大會常務委員會關於〈中華人民共和國香港特別行政區基本法〉第一百零四條的解釋》、上述裁決及跟進行動。」

en: In response to media enquiries on the judgment handed down on the government's legal proceedings concerning the oath-taking of Sixtus Leung Chung-hang and Yau Wai-ching, a government spokesman gave the following response today (November 15):

"We note the Court's judgment on the construction of the relevant provisions in the Oaths and Declarations Ordinance (Cap 11) and the Legislative Council Ordinance (Cap 542) in light of Article 104 of the Basic Law

We will consider the Interpretation of Article 104 of the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, the judgment and the way forward."
zh: 就傳媒查詢法庭頒下政府提出對梁頌恆及游蕙禎的宣誓訴訟案件判決，政府發言人今日（十一月十五日）回應如下︰
「我們得悉法庭的判決，就香港《基本法》第一百零四條對《宣誓及聲明條例》（第11章）及《立法會條例》（第542章）內有關條文的闡釋
我們會研究《全國人民代表大會常務委員會關於〈中華人民共和國香港特別行政區基本法〉第一百零四條的解釋》、上述裁決及跟進行動」
